pred: Oscar and Payne will meet at Tristano's for a coffee in half an hour.
answers: Payne and Oscar will have a coffee at Tristano's in half an hour.

pred: Steffen can't go to the infinity pool because he twisted his ankle. Irene and Dan suggest that Steffen could go with them, but the car can't make it all the way up, so they would have to hike up. Steffen can't walk on his leg, so he can't go. Luke asks if it's Vistas de olas.
answers: Steffen twisted his ankle yesterday and needs a lift to the infinity pool. Irene's car probably won't make it up the hill, so they'd have to park at the bottom and hike up. Mr.Budd should make it up the hill since it's a 4-wheel drive.

pred: Rob is having a few people over to watch the game. Bob is doing usual stuff this weekend. Jim is planning to celebrate his birthday this weekend, but he is going for a skiing trip with his family. Rob will let Jim know if he wants to come to the meetup.
answers: Rob and Bob are watching the game. Bob will run some errands on the weekend. Jim's birthday is next Wednesday. He might organize a meetup this weekend. Bob will see Rob on the weekend.

pred: Carol has too much fruit from her garden and offers some to Jacob. Jacob wants to make preserves but doesn't have the time.
answers: Carol will collect the excess fruit on Wednesday at 6 pm.

pred: Jamie, Marlo, Alex and Jimmy are discussing the group presentations for their class. They are divided into two groups and have to choose their own subjects. Marlo thinks girls are better in this subject. Jamie gives Alex the right to choose first. Jimmy calls Jamie a sexist pig.
answers: Jamie, Marlo, Jimmy and Alex's teacher requires their class to divide into 2 groups, each making a presentation. The teacher sent them the presentation subjects via e-mail. Jamie, Marlo, Jimmy and Alex consider dividing the class into groups by gender.

pred: Dan cooked the BBQ. Sara didn't eat, so she removed herself from the transaction. Gerardo and Eric cooked their own food.
answers: Dan cooked a successful BBQ meal and will split the bill via Splitwise. He invites everyone who did not eat to remove themselves.

pred: Jesse broke his razor and wants to borrow Stig's.
answers: Jesse broke his razor and wants to borrow Stig's.

pred: Mico wants to go to the village party because there might be hot boys. Lia is too tired after hiking. Jim agrees that stupid boys are good. Mico invites Jeff to drive so he can drink. Jeff agrees to go but is not excited.
answers: Mico and Jeff will go to the village party. Jeff will drive.

pred: Ken is angry because he wants his money back. Greg thinks Ken is a prankster.
answers: Ken is trying to play a prank on Greg.

pred: Hannah has made a list of New Year's resolutions, including losing weight, learning to cook, and finding a future husband. Brooklyn has only one resolution: not to make any resolutions. Brooklyn is skeptical about the idea of a fresh start in the new year.
answers: Hannah's New Year's resolutions are: work out, cook for herself, start dating. Brooklyn didn't make any. In the past she had, but she never fulfilled them.

pred: Catherine wants Ben to visit uncle Steve. Ben doesn't want to go because he finds it stressful and doesn't have anything in common with uncle Steve. Catherine mentions that the boys miss Ben. Ben agrees to visit them at a later time.
answers: Ben won't go with Catherine to visit uncle Steve. He will visit her and the boys.

pred: Pegah is working late and won't be able to come over to Miriam's house. Pegah will have a cup of tea with Miriam when she gets back.
answers: Pegah is in class till 15:00. She will work from 17:00 till around 21:30. She will be back at 22:00. Miriam invited people over and wants Pegah to come. Pegah will have a cup of tea with her when she gets back. Miriam will save Pegah some wine.

pred: Lauren is needed for work tomorrow. Pam will call in the morning to let her know if there is more work. Lauren had a good holiday.
answers: Pam doesn't have rota for Lauren, but Manager may give Lauren more tomorrow. Pam and Lauren will meet tomorrow and discuss Lauren's holiday.
